meanings.definition: A device that measures the distance traveled by a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: I used a cyclometers to track how far I rode my bike.
meanings.sent2: The shop sells various cyclometers for cyclists to monitor their distance.
meanings.sent3: The cyclometers beeped happily every time I pedaled faster.
meanings.sent4: Her cyclometers were like a loyal companion, always keeping track of her journeys.
meanings.sent5: The bright display of the cyclometers made it easy to see my progress.

meanings.sent1: We bought two cyclometers for our bikes.
meanings.sent2: The cyclists compared their cyclometers to see who rode the farthest.
meanings.sent3: The cyclometers lined up on the shelf, looking like a small army of trackers.
meanings.sent4: In their hands, the cyclometers became symbols of their shared passion for cycling.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the soft hum of multiple cyclometers counting the miles.
